Posts.Content: Can someone tell me at what point after being diagnosed with breast cancer will your dr. Let you file for sdi (state disability insurance)? Do i have to wait until i have my double masectomy, chemo,?
Posts.Title: disability

Posts.Content: Thank you Kathy from Ohio,                               I found out from the breast care coordinator that I have to wait until I have a surgery date, which I would have had already, but I chose to get a second opinion, an find another healthcare team, thanks for responding, I appreciate it, god bless to u an yours as well,an everyone reading this.
Posts.Title: disability
